name: Aghora
description:
AGHORA

7,500 years ago, evil descended on the land when a rakshasa named Alasura took over the demon throne. He and his minions slaughtered anyone they came across and soon, whole towns and villages were deserted. Only a lone Aghora  could stand up to them. With weapons gifted by the Gods themselves, can you help him destroy evil once and for all?
